GetProduct.Statement: SELECT w2_Product.product_id AS product_id ,w2_Product.product_id AS variation_id ,w2_Product.andmall_reservation_flg AS andmall_reservation_flg FROM w2_Product LEFT JOIN w2_MallExhibitsConfig ON w2_Product.product_id = w2_MallExhibitsConfig.product_id WHERE w2_Product.product_id is not null ## EXHIBITS_FLG ## ## SKU_PRODUCT_ID ## UNION ( SELECT w2_ProductVariation.product_id AS product_id ,w2_ProductVariation.variation_id AS variation_id ,w2_ProductVariation.variation_andmall_reservation_flg ASandmall_reservation_flg FROM w2_ProductVariation LEFT JOIN w2_MallExhibitsConfig ON w2_ProductVariation.product_id = w2_MallExhibitsConfig.product_id WHERE w2_ProductVariation.variation_id is not null ## EXHIBITS_FLG ## ## SKU_VARIATION_ID ## )
